verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> scourged <S%G3146><s%> him.

And <S%G2532><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> platted <S%G4120><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%>, and put it on <S%G2007><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they put on <S%G4016><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a purple <S%G4210><s%> robe <S%G2440><s%>,
And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%>, Hail <S%G5463><s%>, King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>! and <S%G2532><s%> they smote <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with their hands <S%G4475><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%>, I bring <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> fault <S%G156><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%>, wearing <S%G5409><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of thorns <S%G174><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the purple <S%G4210><s%> robe <S%G2440><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> Pilate saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>!

When <S%G3753><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, they cried out <S%G2905><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Crucify <S%G4717><s%> him, crucify <S%G4717><s%> him. Pilate <S%G4091><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> crucify <S%G4717><s%> him: for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fault <S%G156><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, We <S%G2249><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> he ought <S%G3784><s%> to die <S%G599><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.
¶ When <S%G3753><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, he was <S%G5399><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment hall <S%G4232><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Whence <S%G4159><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>? But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> answer <S%G612><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Speakest thou <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto me <S%G1698><s%>? knowest thou <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to crucify <S%G4717><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, Thou couldest have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> at all against <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2596><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> , except <S%G1508><s%> it were <S%G2258><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> : therefore <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1223><s%> he that delivered <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> the greater <S%G3187><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> .

And from <S%G1537><s%> thenceforth <S%G5127><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> cried out <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> thou let <S%G630><s%> this man <S%G5126><s%> go <S%G630><s%>, thou art <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Caesar's <S%G2541><s%> friend <S%G5384><s%>: whosoever <S%G3956><s%> maketh <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> speaketh against <S%G483><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>.

¶ When Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, he brought <S%G71><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sat down <S%G2523><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the judgment seat <S%G968><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> that is called <S%G3004><s%> the Pavement <S%G3038><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%>, Gabbatha <S%G1042><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> the preparation <S%G3904><s%> of the passover <S%G3957><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King <S%G935><s%>!

But <S%G1161><s%> they cried out <S%G2905><s%>, Away with <S%G142><s%> him, away with <S%G142><s%> him, crucify <S%G4717><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. Pilate <S%G4091><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Shall I crucify <S%G4717><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King <S%G935><s%>? The chief priests <S%G749><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, We have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> king <S%G935><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> delivered he <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be crucified <S%G4717><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> they took <S%G3880><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> led him away <S%G520><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he bearing <S%G941><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cross <S%G4716><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> the place of a skull <S%G2898><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Golgotha <S%G1115><s%>:

Where <S%G3699><s%> they crucified <S%G4717><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, on either side one <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1782><s%> <S%G1782><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%>.

¶ And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> a title <S%G5102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> the writing <S%G1125><s%> was <S%G2258><s%>, JESUS <S%G2424><s%> OF NAZARETH <S%G3480><s%> THE KING <S%G935><s%> OF THE JEWS <S%G2453><s%>.

This <S%G5126><s%> title <S%G5102><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> read <S%G314><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was crucified <S%G4717><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> nigh <S%G1451><s%> to the city <S%G4172><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%>, and Greek <S%G1676><s%>, and Latin <S%G4515><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> to Pilate <S%G4091><s%>, Write <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, The King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>.
Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, What <S%G3739><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%>.

¶ Then <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> they had crucified <S%G4717><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, took <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> parts <S%G3313><s%>, to every <S%G1538><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> a part <S%G3313><s%>; and also <S%G2532><s%> his coat <S%G5509><s%>: now <S%G1161><s%> the coat <S%G5509><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> without seam <S%G729><s%>, woven <S%G5307><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the top <S%G509><s%> throughout <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3650><s%>.

They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G240><s%>, Let us <S%G4977><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> rend <S%G4977><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> cast lots <S%G2975><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, whose <S%G5101><s%> it shall be <S%G2071><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, They parted <S%G1266><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%> among them <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> vesture <S%G2441><s%> they did cast <S%G906><s%> lots <S%G2819><s%>. These things <S%G5023><s%> <S%G3303><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> did <S%G4160><s%>.

¶ Now <S%G1161><s%> there stood <S%G2476><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother's <S%G3384><s%> sister <S%G79><s%>, Mary <S%G3137><s%> the wife <S%G3588><s%> of Cleophas <S%G2832><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%>.

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> standing by <S%G3936><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%>, he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, Woman <S%G1135><s%> , behold <S%G2400><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> !

Then <S%G1534><s%> saith he <S%G3004><s%> to the disciple <S%G3101><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> ! And <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> that disciple <S%G3101><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> her <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> home.

¶ After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> were <S%G5055><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> accomplished <S%G5055><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G5048><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%>, I thirst <S%G1372><s%> .

Now <S%G3767><s%> there was set <S%G2749><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of vinegar <S%G3690><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> they filled <S%G4130><s%> a spunge <S%G4699><s%> with vinegar <S%G3690><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put it upon <S%G4060><s%> hyssop <S%G5301><s%>, and put <S%G4374><s%> it to his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

When <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> had received <S%G2983><s%> the vinegar <S%G3690><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%>, It is finished <S%G5055><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> he bowed <S%G2827><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%>, and gave up <S%G3860><s%> the ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, because <S%G1893><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2258><s%> the preparation <S%G3904><s%>, that <S%G3363><s%> the bodies <S%G4983><s%> should <S%G3306><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>, (for <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> an high <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>,) besought <S%G2065><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> their <S%G846><s%> legs <S%G4628><s%> might be broken <S%G2608><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that they might be taken away <S%G142><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brake <S%G2608><s%> the legs <S%G4628><s%> of the <S%G3303><s%> first <S%G4413><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the other <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was crucified with <S%G4957><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and saw <S%G1492><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was dead <S%G2348><s%> already <S%G2235><s%>, they brake <S%G2608><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> legs <S%G4628><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> with a spear <S%G3057><s%> pierced <S%G3572><s%> his <S%G846><s%> side <S%G4125><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forthwith <S%G2117><s%> came there out <S%G1831><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> water <S%G5204><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that saw <S%G3708><s%> it bare record <S%G3140><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> record <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true <S%G228><s%>: and he <S%G2548><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> true <S%G227><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> might believe <S%G4100><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> should be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>, A bone <S%G3747><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G4937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be broken <S%G4937><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, They shall look <S%G3700><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> they pierced <S%G1574><s%>.

¶ And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> of <S%G575><s%> Arimathaea <S%G707><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> a disciple <S%G3101><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> secretly <S%G2928><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, besought <S%G2065><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might take away <S%G142><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> gave him leave <S%G2010><s%>. He came <S%G2064><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G142><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> at the first <S%G4412><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by night <S%G3571><s%>, and brought <S%G5342><s%> a mixture <S%G3395><s%> of myrrh <S%G4666><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> aloes <S%G250><s%>, about <S%G5616><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> pound <S%G3046><s%> weight.

Then <S%G3767><s%> took they <S%G2983><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wound <S%G1210><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in linen clothes <S%G3608><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the spices <S%G759><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> the manner <S%G1485><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> to bury <S%G1779><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> he was crucified <S%G4717><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a garden <S%G2779><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the garden <S%G2779><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> sepulchre <S%G3419><s%>, wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G5087><s%> never <S%G3764><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%>.

There <S%G1563><s%> laid they <S%G5087><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the Jews' <S%G2453><s%> preparation <S%G3904><s%> day; for <S%G3754><s%> the sepulchre <S%G3419><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> nigh at hand <S%G1451><s%>.
